record.title: ORDER FOR PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR AND USE OF CALCULATORS
record.narrative:
ORDER FOR PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR AND USE OF CALCULATORS -- (Senate - March 07, 2008)

[Page: S1781]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the list of staff from the Budget Committee at the desk be granted full floor access privileges; and that the use of calculators be permitted on the floor of the Senate during consideration of the concurrent resolution on the budget.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
